Title: Oru Modhal Oru Kadhal
Actors: Megha Burman, Meera Krishna, Pyramid Natarajan, Vivek Rajgopal
Plot: Oru modhal oru kadhal is a story of a guy (Vivek Rajgopal), who falls in love with a girl, and their trouble-filled journey from Chennai to Bangalore to Delhi giving troubles to his friends and family portrayed hilariously.
